title: Talk of town
description: Got hot takes? Weird news? Campus chika? This is where it all goes down. The place for trending topics, wild thoughts, and everything everyone's secretly talking about. Don't be shy—spill it, post it, debate it.

title: Syntax & Sass
description: For when your code works and you look good doing it. Come here for coding questions, tech rants, debugging drama, and sarcastic semicolons. Slay your errors and serve your logic.

title: Finals() = NoSleep();
description: Finals week is here. Share your study hacks, stress vents, cursed notes, and last-minute breakdowns. We suffer together—like a true recursive function.

title: Spill the Tea ☕️
description: What’s the latest scoop? From wholesome updates to chaotic energy, this is your safe space to share real talk, lowkey drama, and those “you won’t believe what happened” stories. Tea, memes, and vibes only.

title: Dear Diary, But Make It Public
description: Feeling things? Same. Post your inner thoughts, self-reflections, daily randomness, or poetic rambles. This is your open journal where oversharing is encouraged and judgment doesn't live here.
